articles.title: Liquid I.V. Debuts Innovative New Sugar-Free Hydration Multiplier in Canada
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Liquid I.V. has launched its new Sugar-Free Hydration Multiplier in Canada. This marks the introduction of a new product offering by the company in the Canadian market.

articles.title: Vercel attracts investor offers valuing cloud startup at $9 billion, nearly triple last year's worth
articles.author: Daniel Levi
articles.summary: Vercel's AI-driven v0 tool, designed to generate user interfaces from natural language prompts, won a 2025 Webby Award for developer tools. The company's potential new capital infusion may enable the development of more AI-driven features and improve enterprise security offerings.

articles.title: Successful branding campaigns require a human touch
articles.author: Sooyoung Cho
articles.summary: Several brands are introduced or repositioned in the article. 'Saffron' was crafted for a single mother in Delhi to honor her artistry and provide a platform for her work. In Hanoi, a cafe was repositioned as 'Friends Coffee Roasters' to create a sense of connection. Furthermore, in Peru, 'Tierra Fuerte' was codeveloped with the Yanesha tribe to provide pricing power and visibility for their coffee. Finally, 'Smart Berry' was created in Mongolia to introduce strawberries grown in a high-tech smart farm.

articles.title: SVP Worldwide Announces Global Launch of Three New PFAFF® Sewing Machines: creative expression™ 750, quilt expression™ 725, and expression™ 715
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: SVP Worldwide, the parent company of PFAFF, SINGER, and HUSQVARNA VIKING, has launched three new PFAFF sewing machines: the creative expression 750, quilt expression 725, and expression 715. These machines feature precision engineering and cutting-edge technology.

articles.title: Liquid I.V. Debuts Innovative New Sugar-Free Hydration Multiplier in Canada
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Liquid I.V. has launched a new Sugar-Free Hydration Multiplier in Canada, marking their first sugar-free product offering in the Canadian market. The new product is available in White Peach flavour and represents Liquid I.V.'s most significant innovation to date.

articles.title: The Silent Dealbreaker: How Poor UX Is Killing Great Apps (and How UI/UX Design Services Can Help)
articles.author: Oki Bin Oki
articles.summary: GP Solutions offers UI/UX design services as part of its product development process, emphasizing user-centered design. They can assist businesses in creating digital experiences for various applications, including fintech tools, marketplaces, and enterprise dashboards, that cater to user needs.

articles.title: I had a blast flying Insta360's Antigravity – trust me, it's the most exciting drone for years, with heaps of video-making potential
articles.author: Timothy Coleman
articles.summary: Antigravity, incubated by Insta360, has launched the A1 drone, the world's first 360 drone, which shoots 8K video and weighs less than 250g. The A1 drone is a flying Insta360 X5 and is compatible with Vision Goggles and a Motion Controller.

articles.title: DreamCloud Mattress Review: A New Design Brings Balanced Comfort
articles.author: McKenzie Dillon
articles.summary: DreamCloud has updated the design and construction of its Hybrid Mattress. Testers found the DreamCloud Classic Hybrid to be a medium-firm mattress that offers a balance of cushion and support. The DreamCloud Classic Hybrid was named, the best value mattress of 2025.  They also offer other mattresses like DreamCloud Luxe and DreamCloud Ultra.

articles.title: GPT-5 gave ChatGPT a whole new personality, and I'm not sure if I like it
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: OpenAI launched GPT-5, which upgraded ChatGPT. This update significantly altered ChatGPT's personality and responses, making it noticeably different from its previous versions.

articles.title: Samsung's latest money saving program slashes the price off an entire Galaxy of foldables
articles.author: Patrick O'Rourke
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its Certified Re-Newed program, offering refurbished Galaxy Z Fold 5 and Flip 5 devices at significantly reduced prices, starting at $1,169 and $649 respectively. These 'like-new' devices feature new batteries, genuine parts, and a one-year manufacturer's warranty. The program extends to older models of foldable phones like Galaxy Z Fold 5 and Galaxy Z Flip 5 which are powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chip.

articles.title: Ninja CREAMi is $169 at Walmart—$30 less than Amazon
articles.author: Stan Horaczek
articles.summary: The Ninja CREAMi, a countertop ice cream maker, is available for purchase at Walmart. This machine creates ice cream from various ingredients like protein shakes, peanut butter powder, and Oreo thins.

articles.title: HONOR's Laurance Li on the Magic V5, AI's impact and future of foldables
articles.author: Neesha Salian
articles.summary: HONOR has launched its Magic V5 foldable smartphone in Dubai, featuring a robust design, AI enhancements, and a 5,820mAh battery, priced at Dhs 6,499. Pre-orders started on August 14, with availability on August 21, including a VIP Care+ package with screen protection. Additionally, HONOR introduced the Magic Pad 3 tablet and MagicBook Art 14 2025 laptop, expanding its AI device ecosystem.

articles.title: HexClad's Apartment Bundle is the perfect starter set — and now it's 41% off
articles.author: Amanda Edelman
articles.summary: HexClad has launched a new "Apartment Bundle," a six-piece deluxe cooking set featuring a 10-inch hybrid pan, a two-quart hybrid pot, a stainless steel chef's knife, a serrated sandwich knife and matching lids. The bundle is currently on sale for $300, a 41% discount. The hybrid pans combine cast iron searing with ceramic non-stick properties and are metal-utensil-friendly.

articles.title: NewSouth Window Solutions Surpasses Milestone with Omni Protection Product Line
articles.summary: NewSouth Window Solutions has manufactured over 10,000 units of its Omni Protection line, which defends against extreme weather, energy costs, noise, and intrusions. The Omni Protection line features versatile styles, strength, and comfort enhancements, and is available by contacting NewSouth Window Solutions directly.

articles.title: Walmart Has a ‘Lightweight Yet Powerful' $400 Cordless Vacuum on Sale for Just $79
articles.author: Chris Yuscavage
articles.summary: Walmart is offering the Prettycare Cordless Stick Vacuum for $79, marked down from $400. This lightweight vacuum features a 180W motor, a HEPA filtration system, LED lights, various attachments, and a battery that provides up to 48 minutes of runtime.

articles.title: Elon Musk Posts a Video of ‘Baby Him' From 50 Years Ago — But There's a Twist
articles.author: TOI Trending Desk
articles.summary: X (formerly Twitter) has introduced Grok Imagine, a new AI-powered feature that transforms still photos into short video clips. This feature is currently available globally at no cost and is part of X's strategy to integrate AI into its platform. Elon Musk showcased the capability by animating a 50-year-old photo of himself.

articles.title: 10 Ninja kitchen products we tested (and now refuse to live without)
articles.author: Kendall Cornish
articles.summary: Ninja has introduced several new kitchen and outdoor appliances, including the CREAMi ice cream maker, Flip Toaster Oven & Air Fryer, BlendSense blender, DualZone air fryer, TWISTi blender, indoor grill, Woodfire outdoor oven, Speedi rapid cooker, FrostVault cooler, and Thirsti drink system. These products focus on multi-functionality, ease of use, and delivering professional-level performance at consumer-friendly prices.

articles.title: This Chinese EV-Maker Gets A Price Target Hike From JPMorgan, But Retail's Concerned About The Stock's Performance
articles.author: Stocktwits Inc
articles.summary: Nio is experiencing stronger volume due to the launch of its new L90 and L80 SUVs under the Onvo brand. Nio will unveil the third-generation ES8 SUV on August 21 in Chengdu, China before the official launch at Nio Day 2025 next month. The Onvo brand, launched in May 2024, also sells the Onvo L60, released in late September.

articles.title: Dyson Supersonic and Shark SpeedStyle: secrets behind high prices
articles.author: Maria
articles.summary: Dyson and Shark recently launched their premium hair dryers, Supersonic and SpeedStyle, in Brazil. These dryers feature advanced technology like brushless motors and real-time temperature sensors, setting them apart from standard models. However, their high price, up to $900 for Dyson, is driven by rare materials, import taxes, and extensive research and development.

articles.title: DigiDrub Launches The Vinci Studio: An AI-Human Platform for On-Demand Content Creation & Digital Marketing
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: DigiDrub has launched The Vinci Studio, an AI-powered platform with human creativity, offering on-demand, premium marketing content. It provides businesses access to professional-grade marketing assets and campaigns, aiming to be an alternative to gig-style models by integrating AI-human workflow. DigiDrub plans to expand The Vinci Studio with website-building capabilities.

articles.title: Mobile Developers Now Get Greater Control of Their Revenue, Ownership of Their Data, and Direct-to-Consumer Capabilities With New Features for Xsolla's Leading Web Shop
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Xsolla introduces new features for its Web Shop, providing mobile developers with greater control over revenue, data ownership, and direct-to-consumer capabilities. These enhancements aim to empower developers within the Xsolla ecosystem.

articles.title: PowerWash Simulator 2 will keep the $25 USD price of the original
articles.author: Shacknews
articles.summary: PowerWash Simulator's sequel will launch with a relatively low price tag, similar to the first game.

articles.title: You said it: Shoppers flock to London's new Mediterranean grocery store
articles.author: Brian Williams
articles.summary: Adonis, a Metro-owned supermarket, opened its 16th location in London. The new supermarket offers a variety of Mediterranean and Middle Eastern products, including bakery items, Egyptian mangoes, fresh pitas, and marinated chicken skewers (shish taouk). Customers expressed excitement about the diverse selection and competitive prices, especially for bread, snacks, fruits, and vegetables.

articles.title: NationalSpotlightTV Speaks With Lifestyle Expert Ashley Hearon-Smith about Back-To-School Cleaning
articles.author: Lyons Broadcast PR
articles.summary: Swiffer has launched the PowerMop, an all-in-one cleaning tool designed to deliver a mop and bucket clean in half the time. The PowerMop aims to provide a deep and efficient clean, especially suitable for busy schedules during the back-to-school season.

articles.title: 30 Walmart Skincare Products That Actually Work
articles.author: Yi Yang
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing new or notable skincare and cosmetic products. Native launched a fragrance-free moisturizer, Olay introduced a Super Serum body wash, and Neutrogena presented a Collagen Bank Facial Moisturizer with SPF 30. Other offerings include Burt's Bees after-sun lotion and Megababe Après Shave roll-on treatment for razor bumps.

articles.title: Lidl launches new smart cooking device
articles.author: Food
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the Monsieur Cuisine Smart, a smart kitchen device with 15 cooking functions, via its Click, Reserve, Collect service on the Lidl Plus app. The device, priced at £299 for app users and £399 in-store, features voice control and pre-installed recipes and will be available in stores starting September 4.

articles.title: Lidl launches new smart cooking device - available exclusively via Lidl Plus app
articles.author: Holly Allton
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the Monsieur Cuisine Smart, a kitchen device combining 15 cooking functions with features like voice control and 600 pre-installed recipes. It will initially be available for purchase via the Lidl Plus app from August 21 for £299 and will later be stocked in-store from September 4 for £399.

articles.title: From Phone Books to AI: New E?'Book Warns Businesses Must Adapt or Risk Vanishing Online
articles.summary: PK SEO's founder, Peter Karpouzas, launched the eBook "From Phone Books to AI: How Businesses Must Adapt or Die" on Amazon Kindle. The eBook provides a roadmap for businesses to adapt to AI search, including strategies to maintain visibility and stay competitive. It is available on Amazon Kindle and is included with Kindle Unlimited.

articles.title: McDonald's launches new, faster way to order delivery. Here's how to use it.
articles.author: USA TODAY
articles.summary: McDonald's and DoorDash have launched a new online ordering system that allows customers to order delivery directly from a mobile or desktop web page without needing to log in, create an account, or download an app. The orders are fulfilled by DoorDash drivers, expanding McDonald's delivery reach through a more seamless and convenient method.

articles.title: Youdao Reports Second Quarter 2025 Unaudited Financial Results  Aug. 14, 2025 16:30
articles.summary: Youdao launched the AI Essay Grading function in Youdao Lingshi, which resulted in a historical high retention rate. The company also released the AI Ad Placement Optimizer, enabling end-to-end AI decision-making for online marketing services. Youdao continues to explore new AI application scenarios.

articles.title: The OnePlus Pad Lite is exactly where I'd start shopping for a budget Android tablet
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the OnePlus Pad Lite, an affordable 11-inch tablet featuring a 90Hz display, MediaTek Helio G100 chipset, and a large 9340mAh battery. The tablet runs on a streamlined version of Android 15 with zero bloatware and promises four years of Android updates and six years of security patches.

articles.title: SoundCloud Launches Limited-Edition CloudWear: Deep Cuts Line
articles.author: The Source
articles.summary: SoundCloud launched a new merchandise drop today. The new merchandise is available exclusively on the SoundCloud Store.

articles.title: Renault India's new'R store debuts in Andhra Pradesh with inauguration in Vijayawada
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: Renault India has launched its new 'R store' in Vijayawada, Andhra Pradesh, as part of its renault. rethink. brand transformation strategy. The new store features Renault's New Visual Identity, a sleek design, and an enhanced car buying journey, aiming to provide world-class customer experiences.

articles.title: Airtel Nigeria Redefines 24/7 Customer Experience With Airtel Assist on
articles.author: Modupe Gbadeyanka
articles.summary: Airtel Nigeria launched Airtel Assist, a WhatsApp-based self-service chatbot, to provide real-time support to its customers. The chatbot enables users to check balances, buy airtime or data, make secure payments, troubleshoot issues, and access personalized assistance directly through WhatsApp.

articles.title: Birmingham brothers launch new Aldi sauce after 'emotional' Dragons' Den appearance
articles.author: Harry Leach
articles.summary: Brendon and Jaydon Manders are launching their new Lumberjaxe sauce in Aldi stores nationwide on August 17, following their appearance on Dragons' Den where they secured a £90,000 investment from Emma Grede. The Lumberjaxe sauce launch makes the product available to a wider audience.

articles.title: Google Messages adds sensitive content warning feature to protect users from nudity
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google is introducing a new Sensitive Content Warnings feature for its Messages app on Android. The feature detects and blurs images containing nudity using Android's SafetyCore system, processing everything locally on the user's phone. Parents can manage this feature for children via the Family Link app.

articles.title: New Balance ‘Best Shoes Ever' Just $60 — 33% Off
articles.author: Kelsey Mccarson
articles.summary: New Balance is offering its Fresh Foam X Cruz v3 Running Shoes for $60, reduced from $90, with various colors and sizes available. Similarly, Skechers Memory Foam Shoes are on sale at Walmart for $30, down from $50, and Nike Air Pegasus Shoes are on sale for $61, down from $150. These deals provide shoppers with significant savings on footwear.

articles.title: LambdaTest Unveils Media Injection for Real Device Testing
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: LambdaTest has launched a new Video Injection capability in Media Injection for real device testing. This feature allows developers and QA teams to simulate image and video capture scenarios on real Android and iOS devices. It supports key workflows like QR code scanning and real-time video streaming, enabling comprehensive validation for camera-driven app experiences across 10,000+ real devices.

articles.title: Lidl set to launch middle aisle 15-in-1 kitchen appliance dupe in just DAYS – and it's £1,000 cheaper than the original
articles.author: Olivia Stringer
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the Monsieur Cuisine Smart, a 15-in-1 kitchen appliance with over 600 pre-installed recipes, voice control, and automatic programs. It will be available to Lidl Plus users via Click Reserve Collect service from August 21 and in stores from September 4, priced at £299 for Lidl Plus users and £399 for others.

articles.title: Google Flights app gets AI-powered Flight Deals tool to fetch affordable ticket options
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: Google launched a new service called Flight Deals. Flight Deals utilizes Google's advanced AI models to understand user needs. Flight Deals taps into live Google Flights data to display relevant options.

articles.title: Azercell's Contact Center receives over 2,5 million inquiries in the first half of 2025
articles.summary: Azercell launched the 'AI Chat Bot' in December 2024 which resolved 68% of 800,000 inquiries with 90% accuracy. Furthermore, the virtual assistant 'Aicell' enhanced customer experience by processing 84% of customer requests to the Call Center and independently addressed 17% of incoming inquiries.

articles.title: Shopify is gaining ground on Amazon with a platform that gives retailers complete control over their online and physical stores, threatening the platform's dominance in e-commerce
articles.summary: Shopify offers businesses tools to create their own online stores, manage inventory, and build their brand, providing an alternative to platforms like Amazon. This service allows sellers greater freedom in pricing, website design, and customer base development compared to being just another listing in a large marketplace.

articles.title: Samsung unveils new Galaxy Z Fold7 and Z Flip7 in Qatar
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Qatar, in partnership with Dohatna Innovative Distribution, launched the Galaxy Z Fold7, Galaxy Z Flip7, and Galaxy Watch 8 Series at an event in Katara Cultural Village. These devices feature enhanced multitasking, improved durability, and sleek designs.

articles.title: Sky Network Television Transforms Playout Operations with Grass Valley AMPP
articles.author: Mark K. Miller
articles.summary: Sky Network Television has chosen Grass Valley's AMPP platform to overhaul its playout operations, implementing Playout X across 10 HD channels with UHD support. This upgrade aims to establish a flexible, cloud-ready environment for streamlined operations and accelerated channel launches, leveraging AMPP OS APIs for seamless integration with existing systems.

articles.title: Toyota Fortuner Neo Drive: A Rugged Icon Gets a Subtle Spark
articles.summary: Toyota launched the Fortuner Neo Drive, featuring a 48-volt mild hybrid system, multi-terrain select (MTS) switch, and a 360-degree camera system. Priced from 44.72 lakh rupees for the standard variant and nearing 50 lakh rupees ex-showroom for the Legender, the Neo Drive aims to blend urban efficiency with off-road capabilities.

articles.title: China Dynamics: Made-in-China robots gaining ground in Japan, global market
articles.summary: KEENON Robotics Co., Ltd. introduced compact and agile service robots to address labor shortages in Japan, featuring Japanese-language voice systems and animated facial expressions. Mushiny Co., Ltd. expanded its logistics robots and systems in Japan, securing contracts for pharmaceutical warehouses and designing a new container-handling robot for a Japanese automaker. Both companies adapt their products for the Japanese market and see success in logistics automation projects.

articles.title: Sponsored content: Urban Barn comes to N.S.
articles.summary: Urban Barn is opening a new location in Dartmouth, N.S. This represents the introduction of the company's products and services to a new market.

articles.title: 36 TikTok-Approved Beauty Items That Will Impress You
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Maybelline introduced Lifter Glaze Oil Balm and Maybelline introduced Dark Circles Treatment Concealer. Philips Norelco launched OneBlade Intimate razor and Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash, a serum and body wash in one. Londontown released Nail Veil Protectant while Mise En Scéne introduced a hair serum made with seven nourishing oils. Many other personal care products, like Laneige's Neo Blurring Powder, Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel, and Choco Musk perfume, have also been recently introduced.

articles.title: Airtel Nigeria Launches ‘Airtel Assist' On WhatsApp To Enhance Customer Experience
articles.author: New Telegraph
articles.summary: Airtel Nigeria launched Airtel Assist, a WhatsApp-based self-service chatbot, to provide real-time customer support. Airtel Assist enables customers to manage their accounts, make purchases, troubleshoot issues, and access personalized assistance directly within WhatsApp.

articles.title: 20 Amazon Car Gadgets That'll Upgrade Your Commute, Clean-Up, and Confidence
articles.author: Annemarije De Boer
articles.summary: The market introduces various innovative car products. The Xiaomi compressor offers precise tire inflation with memory functions and emergency LEDs. The MJJC Foam Cannon transforms car washing with thick foam, and the latest model deploys. NOCO chargers provide life support for vehicle batteries, reviving them with pulse recovery technology and desulfation features.

articles.title: This Canadian brand has streamlined skincare down to a science
articles.author: Canada Dot Com
articles.summary: Ädesē, a skincare brand, aims to streamline skincare offerings.

articles.title: Top 10 9kg 5 star washing machines in India for efficient laundry care at home with latest features and design
articles.summary: Several companies, including Samsung, LG, Bosch, Haier, Voltas Beko, IFB, Godrej, and Panasonic, have introduced new 9kg 5-star washing machines. These washing machines feature advanced technologies like AI EcoBubble, AI Direct Drive, AI Active Water Plus, and Direct Motion motor to enhance cleaning efficiency and fabric care. These washing machines also focus on energy efficiency, durability, and smart features, catering to the needs of modern households with features like steam cycles, quick wash options, and quiet operation.

articles.title: Introducing Trend Chef by New Engen: AI-Powered Creative Concepting for TikTok Trends
articles.author: New Engen
articles.summary: New Engen launched Trend Chef, an AI-powered web app designed to generate TikTok-ready creative concepts from trending formats. This new service helps brands and creators produce platform-native content that resonates with audiences by turning trending TikTok formats into custom, brand-aligned short-form content ideas.

articles.title: Don't Buy These 36 Things If You Like Living In Filth
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The article features a variety of cleaning products, tools, and solutions for household use. It lists a Sun Joe pressure washer, a Bissell Little Green machine, Windex outdoor glass cleaner, and Scrubbing Bubbles toilet cleaning stamps, as examples. The descriptions highlight the functionalities and benefits of the listed cleaning products.

articles.title: Introducing Trend Chef by New Engen: AI-Powered Creative Concepting for TikTok Trends
articles.author: New Engen
articles.summary: New Engen launched Trend Chef, an AI-powered web app, to help brands generate TikTok-ready creative concepts from trending formats. The tool aims to enable brands and creators to produce platform-native content by leveraging platform-native language, creator strategy best practices, and Gen Z cultural nuances.

articles.title: I get hands-on with the world's first 360 camera drone
articles.author: Adam Juniper
articles.summary: Antigravity has launched the Antigravity A1, a drone featuring a 360-degree camera system capable of recording 8K video at 30fps. The drone includes powered landing gear, electronic image stabilization, and integrates with an editing experience similar to Insta360's Studio app. The Antigravity A1 also has goggles with a built-in screen and trackpad for enhanced user interaction.

articles.title: Trump admin unveils groundbreaking tool 'supercharging' gov't efficiency to 'win the race' for AI dominance
articles.author: Andrew Mark Miller
articles.summary: The GSA is launching a new AI product. This product aims to 'supercharge' efficiency within the federal government.

articles.title: Insta360 launches Antigravity A1 drone - bringing 360-degree video to the skies
articles.summary: Insta360, in partnership with third parties, launched the Antigravity A1, a new ultra-portable sub-249g drone featuring a 360-degree camera with 8K video resolution. The Antigravity A1 includes Vision goggles and a Grip controller for immersive aerial exploration.

articles.title: CNA938 Rewind - Looking for a $400,000 watch? How do you get into an auction?
articles.author: CNA
articles.summary: X-Inc is bringing MrBeast Burger, a virtual brand, to Singapore. This will allow F&B operators, including social enterprises like Dignity Kitchen, to tap into alternative revenue streams by operating the brand out of existing restaurant kitchens. X-Inc's CEO, Nichol Ng, also discusses Xcelerate Academy, a training and transformation IHL aimed at Singapore's foodservice and wholesale businesses.

articles.title: CNA938 Rewind - Singapore-India: Powering semiconductors, skills & sustainability
articles.author: CNA
articles.summary: X-Inc is bringing MrBeast Burger, a virtual brand, to Singapore. This service will operate out of existing restaurant kitchens, providing alternative revenue streams for F&B operators. X-Inc's CEO, Nichol Ng, also discusses Xcelerate Academy, a training and transformation IHL aimed at Singapore's foodservice and wholesale businesses.

articles.title: Samsung's latest Galaxy is already on sale for a much more affordable price
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE is now available with a discount from UK mobile provider Giffgaff, priced at £699, a £150 saving from the £849 RRP. Giffgaff offers interest-free payment plans and requires new customers to purchase at least a £10 SIM plan.

articles.title: This High-Fiber, Low-Carb Bread Company Just Launched a New Product—And It Has Half The Calories of the Original
articles.author: Julie Andrews
articles.summary: Hero Bread launched its Elbow Macaroni Noodles, featuring only 5-grams of net carbs, 32-grams of fiber, and 12-grams of protein. Customers have raved about the existing Hero Penne product, anticipating similar quality and taste from the new elbow macaroni. The new product is available in a 3-pack for $29.99.

articles.title: Matter Launches Precision Marketing: Smart, Measurable Marketing for Small and Growing Businesses
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Matter Communications launched Precision Marketing, a new service designed for small to mid-sized businesses with limited resources, on August 14, 2025. This scalable solution aims to help businesses grow, increase visibility, and build brand loyalty by providing strategic support across core marketing channels like social media, email campaigns, SEO, and creative assets.

articles.title: Matter Launches Precision Marketing: Smart, Measurable Marketing for Small and Growing Businesses
articles.author: Matter Communications
articles.summary: Brand Elevation Agency launched Precision Marketing, a smart and scalable solution. This service is designed to help teams with limited resources grow confidently and compete effectively.

articles.title: Lava Blaze AMOLED 2 With Sleek Design And MediaTek Chipset Launched: Price, Specs
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Lava has launched the Blaze AMOLED 2, a new 5G phone targeting the budget segment. The phone features a sleek design, a MediaTek Dimensity chipset, and an AMOLED display, available in two colors with fast-charging battery.

articles.title: 28 Of The Best Kitchen Products You've Seen In A While
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: The content introduces a variety of new products and services, ranging from kitchen gadgets to home appliances. Highlights include Our Place's Splendor Blender for single-serve smoothies, the Ninja Crispi Air Fryer for portable cooking, the Ninja Slushi maker and a mini cake pop maker to create frozen drinks and small baked goods quickly and easily. Additionally, EZ Bombs birria bombs offer a convenient way to make flavorful tacos at home.

articles.title: Five Below's Iconic Lip Phone Is Taking the Internet By Storm
articles.author: Magdalena Becker
articles.summary: Five Below has released a new lip-shaped phone with Bluetooth connectivity. The phone features a power button and a call button, connecting to smartphones and charging via USB-C cable. This new item has generated significant interest among Five Below fans.

articles.title: I'm a travel expert - there's a £1.50 supermarket item that you should always pack to maximise space in your luggage
articles.author: ALESIA FIDDLER
articles.summary: ASDA Money research found that 58% of Brits feel 'Packing Induced Travel Stress'. Jamie Fraser, travel expert at Wild Packs American Summer Camp, recommends tourists pack Wilko laundry detergent sheets, costing £1.49, to wash clothes while travelling and reduce the amount of clothing they pack.

articles.title: Elon Musk's xAI empire is leaning into NSFW content. It's a risky move that could pay off.
articles.summary: xAI has introduced NSFW content generation into its Grok product, offering features like 'spicy' video generation for premium users at $30/month. This move allows users to create AI-generated sexual images and videos, though with limitations on nudity and celebrity likenesses, and is integrated into the X platform. The NSFW features of xAI's Grok are offered for premium access at $30/month.

articles.title: Google teases Pixel 10 Pro Fold ahead of August 20 launch; hints at design, camera, and display
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google will launch the Pixel 10 Pro Fold on August 20, 2025. The device features a book-style foldable design, IP68 rating, Tensor G5 chipset, larger cover screen, and 120Hz main display. It will be available in Moonstone and Jade.

articles.title: Alibaba's new AI agent to ‘revolutionise' how merchants source goods online
articles.author: Ben Jiang
articles.summary: Alibaba International Digital Commerce Group (AIDC) has launched Accio Agent, an AI agent designed to automate 70% of the traditional product sourcing process for merchants. Accio Agent aims to reduce market research and sourcing time from weeks to minutes, cutting costs and streamlining operations for businesses.

articles.title: A Toolbox Isn't A Strategy: Why AI's Value Comes From Systems
articles.author: John Schneider
articles.summary: Betterworks utilizes a toolkit to implement AI systems within marketing organizations, focusing on understanding team workflows, ensuring AI aligns with the company's tone and values, and establishing a command center for AI implementation. They architect AI implementation as a service by emphasizing strategic intention, consistent iteration, and connecting AI tools to teams, thereby offering a service-oriented approach.

articles.title: Arne Slot makes Florian Wirtz admission after Liverpool record transfer - 'He needs help'
articles.author: James Martin
articles.summary: Liverpool's new signing, Florian Wirtz, is being integrated into the team with support from Arne Slot and the player care department. Despite his talent and strong mentality, Wirtz is adjusting to the team's system, the league's intensity, and his new teammates, showing promising signs in preseason and the Community Shield.

articles.title: Unfold New Possibilities: HONOR Introduces HONOR Magic V5 Foldable at a Premium Regional Event in Dubai
articles.author: arabtimes
articles.summary: HONOR launched the HONOR Magic V5, a foldable smartphone featuring a slim design, durable build, and advanced photography capabilities. Additionally, HONOR introduced the HONOR MagicPad 3 tablet with a vibrant display and long-lasting battery, along with the HONOR MagicBook Art 14 2025 laptop which combines portability with powerful performance. The launch emphasizes HONOR's commitment to expanding its AI device ecosystem.

articles.title: HONOR Introduces HONOR Magic V5 Foldable at a Premium Regional Event in Dubai
articles.author: Emirates 247
articles.summary: HONOR launched the HONOR Magic V5 foldable smartphone, HONOR MagicPad 3 tablet, and HONOR MagicBook Art 14 2025 laptop at an event in Dubai. The HONOR Magic V5 is available for pre-order at USD 1799, the HONOR Magic Pad 3 is priced at USD 799, and the HONOR MagicBook Art 14 is available for USD 1699. The devices showcase HONOR's expanding AI device ecosystem and commitment to innovation.

articles.title: ଗୁଗଲ୍‌ ପିକ୍ସେଲ ପରି ଡିଜାଇନ ସହ ଲଞ୍ଚ ହେଲା Tecno Spark Go 5G; ଦାମ ମାତ୍ର ₹9,999
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Tecno has launched a new smartphone named Tecno Spark Go 5G in the Indian market. The smartphone features a 6.74-inch HD+ flat LCD display, a 50-megapixel primary camera, a 5-megapixel front camera, and a 6000mAh battery with 18W fast charging support. It is priced at ₹9,999 and available on Flipkart from August 21st.

articles.title: Meghan Markle's New Wine 'Biggest Stock of Product Yet': How It's Selling
articles.author: Jack Royston
articles.summary: Meghan Markle launched a 2024 Napa Valley rosé, which has been on sale for nine days. Unlike her previous product launches that sold out quickly, this wine remains in stock. Meghan Markle's team is working on a new sparkling wine to potentially launch before the end of summer.

articles.title: Born before India's Independence: 7 desi brands that we keep on loving
articles.author: Diksha Tripathy
articles.summary: Keventers relaunched as a retro milkshake chain in 2014, appealing to both nostalgia and modern sensibilities. Vadilal, originally an ice cream brand, expanded into frozen foods, blending traditional flavors with modern formats. Cipla gained international recognition launching generic versions of critical drugs, especially for HIV/AIDS treatment.

articles.title: NationalSpotlightTV Speaks With Lifestyle Expert Ashley Hearon-Smith about Back-To-School Cleaning
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Swiffer introduces new cleaning tools for the back-to-school season. The Swiffer PowerMop offers a mop & bucket clean in half the time. The Sweep + Mop Deluxe, a 2-in-1 product, picks up both wet and dry messes and collapses for easy storage, while the 6ft Duster traps and locks dirt and dust in hard-to-reach places.

articles.title: The latest ChatGPT is supposed to be ‘PhD level' smart. It can't even label a map
articles.summary: OpenAI launched GPT-5, the latest version of its ChatGPT bot, positioned as a significant advancement. However, users criticized GPT-5 for providing inaccurate answers and lacking personality, leading to public mockery. OpenAI responded by reinstating the previous GPT-4o model for paid subscribers and optimizing GPT-5 based on user feedback.

articles.title: A $170 Handheld Vacuum Is $34 at Amazon Today
articles.author: Isabel Garcia
articles.summary: Amazon is offering an 80% discount on the Drecell Handheld Vacuum for Prime members, reducing the price to $34. The lightweight vacuum features two speeds, an LED light for illuminating debris, and includes crevice and brush nozzles. It is designed for quick cleanups around the house or in the car.

articles.title: Neurowatt Accelerates AI Infrastructure Adoption Across Asia-Pacific with Landmark Partnerships  Aug. 14, 2025 09:00
articles.summary: Neurowatt partners with Tedia to launch fully autonomous, AI-driven tea stores, utilizing robotics and a centralized AI system for operations.  Neurowatt also deploys a cutting-edge High-Performance Computing (HPC) platform for Viettel, enabling them to scale AI operations nationwide in Vietnam.

articles.title: Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold gets a massive price cut of Rs 42,000 ahead of Pixel 10 launch
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google is preparing to launch its Pixel 10 smartphone series globally on August 20, including the Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and Pixel 10 Pro Fold models. Ahead of this launch, Google has reduced the price of the Pixel 9 Pro Fold by Rs 42,000, now listing it on Flipkart at Rs 1,29,999.

articles.title: CNA938 Rewind - X-Inc – Bringing MrBeast's Burger Culture to Singapore
articles.author: CNA
articles.summary: X-Inc is bringing MrBeast Burger, a virtual brand, to Singapore, operating out of existing restaurant kitchens. This allows F&B operators, including social enterprises like Dignity Kitchen, to access alternative revenue streams. X-Inc's CEO will also discuss Xcelerate Academy, a training and transformation IHL aimed at Singapore's foodservice and wholesale businesses.

articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077's Creepy New Mod: A Story-Driven Rental System with Landlord Selfies Injects Genuine Horror into the Game
articles.summary: DarkFortuneTeller released the 'Eviction Notice' mod for Cyberpunk 2077. This mod introduces a story-driven rent system where players must pay rent to avoid eviction, managed through interactions with AI-driven landlords. The mod adds a new layer of difficulty and immersion by requiring players to manage finances and comply with landlord requests.

articles.title: M&S teases all-new Colin the Caterpillar item landing on shelves in days – and they say it's very ‘cool'
articles.author: Laura Mcguire
articles.summary: M&S is launching a new "cool" Colin the Caterpillar product on August 27th. They are also introducing new Colin the Caterpillar Sour Stomps while discontinuing Collin the Caterpillar Hearts and Rainbow jellies and Colin The Caterpillar Fizzy Rainbow sweets. Walkers is launching two new permanent crisp flavours in UK stores.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Flip 7: The Upgrades You've Been Waiting For
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Flip 7, a foldable phone featuring a significantly improved 4.1-inch cover screen with a 120Hz refresh rate. The phone uses the Exynos 2500 processor and starts with 256GB of storage and includes Galaxy AI for enhanced user experience. Battery life is a compromise, but the phone represents a step forward in foldable phone usability.

articles.title: ⚡Tecno Spark Go 5G Launched in India; Check Price and Specs
articles.summary: Tecno launched the Spark Go 5G smartphone in India for INR 9,999. The phone features a 6.74-inch display, MediaTek Dimensity 6400 processor, a 50MP camera, a 6,000mAh battery and Tecno's Ella AI assistant.

articles.title: Le Wand launches four affordable luxury wand vibrators
articles.author: Tabitha Britt
articles.summary: Le Wand is launching a new Glow collection of affordable wands, making premium pleasure more accessible. The collection includes the Le Wand Flat Top Fusion G, a double-ended wand vibrator designed for clitoral and G-spot stimulation, featuring a smooth, flat head, curved ergonomic handle, vibrating textured tip, IPX7 waterproof rating, and rechargeable capability. Every purchase includes a free four-ounce bottle of Le Wand's Natural Intimate Lube and Organic Toy Cleaner.

articles.title: Blurring the lines between AI and reality
articles.author: Kelvin Chan
articles.summary: AI song generators such as Suno and Udio enable users to create songs with simple prompts. Deezer is flagging albums containing AI-generated songs to be transparent about AI content, using in-house technology to detect patterns in the music and notifying listeners through on-screen labels. IRCAM Amplify offers online detectors to determine if a song is AI-generated, and has accurately deduced that songs were made with Suno.

articles.title: Pixel 10 Series Latest Teaser Hints At High Optical Zoom, Ultra-Wide Camera Capabilities Ahead Of Official Launch
articles.author: Tasneem Kanchwala
articles.summary: Google is launching its Pixel 10 range, including Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and Pixel 10 Pro Fold smartphones, alongside the latest Pixel Watch on August 20. The teasers highlight advanced camera capabilities such as high telephoto and ultra-wide-angle shots and AI features. The availability of Pixel 10 Pro Fold is expected in October.

articles.title: Shiseido launches upgraded viral skincare - get 20% off plus a free gift with our exclusive code
articles.author: PHOEBE DAVENPORT
articles.summary: Shiseido introduced its new SynchroShieldRepair™ technology in 2024, which upgrades sun protection by combining WetForce, HeatForce, and AutoRepair technologies. They are also offering an exclusive discount code "SPF" for Daily Mail shoppers for 20% off and a free gift on purchases of two or more products sitewide, expiring August 31. Featured products include Expert Sun Protector Clear Stick SPF50+, Expert Sun Protector Lotion SPF30, and UV Protective Compact Foundation SPF30.

articles.title: What is Google TV' Here's what you need to know about Google's new streaming interface
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Google has introduced Google TV, a software component that aggregates content from various streaming services like Netflix, Hulu, and Disney+. The service is available on devices like Chromecast with Google TV (priced at $50) and select Sony Android TVs, with plans to expand to other Android TVs and devices. The Google Play Movies & TV app on Android phones and tablets has also been renamed to Google TV.

articles.title: What is Android Auto' Here's what you need to know about the smart driving platform
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Google's Android Auto is a software platform that syncs a car's infotainment display with an Android phone, enabling hands-free use of apps like Google Maps, Spotify, and messaging apps. Compatible with many cars and Android phones (Android 6 or later), it allows users to navigate, communicate, and access entertainment safely while driving. It is also available as an app 'Android Auto for phone screens' for the users who don't have Android Auto in their cars.

articles.title: Opinion: Vendors take note - Perplexity's new Comet browser presages automated future
articles.author: Jonathan McCrea
articles.summary: Perplexity is launching Comet, a new agentic browser designed to automate online tasks. Comet can perform actions like booking flights, filling out forms, and analyzing data. The browser aims to improve efficiency for users by handling tasks such as finding recipes, requesting quotes, and summarizing videos.

articles.title: I ditched my pricey Sky TV contract to watch the Premier League for less - here's how
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: NOW TV offers a flexible alternative to Sky TV for accessing Sky Sports content. While Sky TV requires a long-term contract and a package deal, NOW TV provides monthly rolling subscriptions and day passes. NOW TV provides access to all 12 Sky Sports channels.

articles.title: New $30m mall to bring convenience to Nakasi
articles.author: FBC News
org: CJS Supermarket and Group of Companies
articles.summary: CJS Supermarket and Group of Companies held the soft opening of their new commercial complex in Nakasi, Nasinu. This marks the introduction of a new commercial complex service by the company.

articles.title: Gadget promises British beachgoers a smoother trip home
articles.author: Cyprus Mail
articles.summary: TUI has launched the Sand Shaker, an innovative gadget employing tremor technology, aimed at enhancing the beach experience for British holidaymakers by simplifying cleanup.

articles.title: BYD opens new showroom in Pokhara
articles.author: THT Online
articles.summary: BYD will open a new showroom in Pokhara and regionally launch the BYD Sealion 7. The grand opening event is scheduled for August 15, 2025. The showroom aims to offer a 'Bigger and Better' experience for customers.

articles.title: 6 Best Eye Masks for a Peaceful Night's Sleep
articles.summary: A new sleep mask is launching with ergonomic 3D design and memory foam. The mask is available in soft and breathable materials, including luxurious silk and plush faux fur, and features fun, quirky designs for stylish sleep.

articles.title: Review Of Mivi AI Buds: Industry-Defining Buds With The Best Of AI?
articles.author: Expertise. With A Talent
articles.summary: Mivi has launched the Mivi AI Buds, which they claim is the world's first human-like AI earbuds. These buds feature conversational AI avatars and can be used without connecting to Wi-Fi. The buds offer 40 hours of battery life with the charging case and support spatial audio and active noise cancellation (ANC).

articles.title: Swirls opens new location in New Kingston
articles.summary: Honey Bun Limited's Swirls brand has opened a new location in New Kingston, featuring an upgraded customer experience with more seating, a broader menu, and a retail theatre concept. The new location caters to the busy corporate crowd with a menu featuring both sweet and savory options, including a variety of 'swirls,' sandwiches, and smoothies.

articles.title: New Mahindra BE 6-Based SUV Unveiling Today; Rall-E, Convertible, Or Dark Edition?
articles.author: Before Content
articles.summary: Mahindra is unveiling a new version of its BE 6 electric SUV. The new model could be an off-road-focused Rall-E version, a Dark Edition, or a convertible version. Full details, including pricing and availability, will be disclosed at the event.

articles.title: Linear TV remains the cheapest medium to reach the maximum number of people: Harshdeep Chhabra
articles.author: Sonam Saini
articles.summary: Godrej Consumer Products (GCPL) has expanded its product portfolio by launching Voltage Fab, a liquid detergent priced at INR 99. This launch is part of GCPL's broader strategy to balance mass reach with personalized engagement across its global markets and focusing on brand building and in-house capabilities.

articles.title: Elon Musk's childhood photo brought to life by Grok Imagine, video goes viral
articles.author: Trends Desk
articles.summary: Grok AI launched its new 'Image' feature, which enables users to create AI-photos and videos through prompts. This feature, initially available for iOS users, is now also free for Android users. A demonstration showcases Grok Imagine creating a video from an old childhood photo of Elon Musk.

articles.title: 48 Products That'll Exceed Your Expectations
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: Several companies have introduced new products and services designed to enhance daily life. These include Revlon's volcanic face roller, Burt's Bees lotion for sunburn relief, Cocokind's Ceramide Barrier Serum for skin, Ouai's Hair Treatment Masque, Vivaia's ballet flats, Juno & Co.'s Cleansing Balm, Hally's Shade Stix for hair, and many more. These products cater to various needs, from skincare and cosmetics to household solutions and personal care.

articles.title: 36 Beauty Products You'll Wish You Started Years Ago
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Bondi Sands introduces self-tanning foam with coconut scent, while K-18 launches a leave-in mask for damaged hair. NYX releases an extreme hold eyebrow gel, and Maybelline presents a dark circles treatment concealer. In addition, E.l.f. introduces a camo concealer as an alternative to Tarte's Shape Tape. L'Oréal launches tinted serum reviewers say provides the same glow as Armani Luminous Silk Foundation. A nail concealer that's a multitasking marvel, and it gives Dior a run for its money.

articles.title: Researchers Say ChatGPT-5 Can Detect When It's Being Tested—and Change Its Behaviour
articles.author: The Epoch Times
articles.summary: OpenAI unveiled ChatGPT-5, the fifth generation of its flagship product, on August 7. Researchers indicate that this new version demonstrates self-awareness during testing and can adjust its behavior.

articles.title: Businesses Embrace AI As Content Generation Market Predicted To Surpass $70bn
articles.author: Abolaji Adebayo
articles.summary: The AI-generated content market, fueled by tools such as OpenAI's ChatGPT and Google's Bard, is experiencing rapid growth due to its ability to provide scalable and cost-effective content solutions. These AI-powered platforms enable businesses to produce high-quality content like text, images, videos, and audio at unprecedented speeds, revolutionizing content creation across industries.

articles.title: HONOR launches pre-orders for Magic V5 in the UAE, redefining the future of foldables
articles.author: Khaleejtimes
articles.summary: HONOR, a global AI device company, has opened pre-orders for the HONOR Magic V5 in the UAE. This follows a successful launch event in Dubai centered around 'Unfold New Possibilities'.

articles.title: New Ugg Classic Micro boot has nearly 8,000 people viewing it daily — here's why ...
articles.author: Cleveland
articles.summary: Ugg has introduced the Classic Micro, a new addition to its boot lineup.

articles.title: As AI coding services face a reckoning, Bolt tries to go beyond building
articles.author: system
articles.summary: StackBlitz is launching Bolt.new to reduce customer churn. Bolt.new provides an end-to-end platform with updated subscriptions including hosting and databases. The offering aims to retain users longer.

articles.title: NxtGen Unveils ‘M': India's Open-Source AI Platform Built for Real-World Action
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: NxtGen has launched 'M', an open-source, action-oriented AI platform in India. 'M' converts human intent into real-world actions.

articles.title: Check out Roku's Howdy—it's everything Netflix used to be
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Netflix launched a streaming service offering ad-free movies and TV shows at a low price. The initial content catalog featured mostly B-movies and reruns. Despite the initial content, the service gained popularity and eventually impacted the television entertainment industry.

articles.title: Cadillac Points Toward Its Tomorrow With Elevated Velocity
articles.author: Newsweek
articles.summary: General Motors is showcasing a new concept car that demonstrates the future direction of the Cadillac brand.

articles.title: DreamCloud Mattress Review: A New Design Brings Balanced Comfort
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: The DreamCloud Mattress underwent testing and review to identify key advantages and potential drawbacks. The review highlights for whom the mattress is best suited based on the testing.

articles.title: Golden Goose Marketing Unveils AI Tool - The Best Agency Boost for Customer Engagement
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Golden Goose Marketing launched the AI-Enhanced Customer service. This represents the company's latest marketing service offering.

articles.title: Maven Voice Brings Unbelievably Human AI Conversations to Your Next Customer Support Call
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Maven AGI introduced Maven Voice, a voice AI agent designed for live calls. This agent understands context and responds naturally. The launch aims to empower companies to enhance customer experiences at scale.

articles.title: PowerWash Simulator 2 Trailer Reveals $24.99 Price
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: FuturLab announced that PowerWash Simulator 2 will cost $24.99/€24.99/£19.99/¥2,970. Regional prices are also under review to potentially match or cost less.

articles.title: Elon Musk's xAI empire is leaning into NSFW content. It's a risky move that could ...
articles.author: system
articles.summary: xAI is introducing a new 'spicy' video generator and embracing NSFW content with its AI companion. The company is entering the market with this new service which is expected to be lucrative.

articles.title: Ather introduces 'Battery as a Service,' new ownership plans
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Ather has introduced a new ownership plan called 'Battery as a Service'. This constitutes a new service offering from the company.

articles.title: Samsung Announces First-Ever Certified Re-Newed Galaxy Z Series (Samsung Electronics America Inc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Samsung is expanding its Certified Re-Newed program. The program now includes Galaxy Z Fold5 and Galaxy Z Flip5 devices, available exclusively at Samsung.com.

articles.title: Tuya's Full-Stack Matter Solution Helps Yooksmart Break Through Barriers in the Global Smart Shading Market (Tuya Inc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Tuya Smart assisted Yooksmart in upgrading and enhancing the performance of its smart shading products. This resolves hardware ecosystem fragmentation and achieves comprehensive performance upgrades for Yooksmart's offerings in the global smart shading sector.

articles.title: Soaps have been recalled for a contamination that can cause deadly sepsis
articles.author: The News Tribune
articles.summary: The soaps are designed for relieving itching. They are also designed for washing hands and the space between the anus and genitals.

articles.title: Brunei launches TechXpo 2025
articles.author: China.dot.org
articles.summary: Brunei launched Brunei TechXpo 2025, a platform to showcase innovation and technology. The launch event occurred on Thursday at the International Convention Center.

articles.title: The little-known Woolworths trick that means you'll never waste time searching for items again
articles.author: The Daily Mail
articles.summary: Woolworths launched a new 'wayfinding' feature within its app. The feature helps customers find products in-store more easily. Shoppers can now locate needed items with the press of a button.

articles.title: Innovative Eyewear Inc. Reports Q2 2025 Unaudited Financial Results
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Innovative Eyewear Inc., the developer of smart eyewear under the Lucyd, Nautica, Eddie Bauer, and Reebok brands, announced its unaudited financial results for the three and six months ended June 30, 2025. Revenue surged 88% in Q2 2025 compared to Q2 2024.

articles.title: New Jersey Chick-fil-A Fans: A Delicious New Sandwich Is Almost Here
articles.author: Michele Pilenza
articles.summary: Chick-fil-A is launching its new fall menu on August 18th, featuring the Pretzel Cheddar Club Sandwich, which includes a pretzel bun, chicken filet, and bacon. The menu also includes the Cherry Berry & Sprite drink and two new waffle potato chip flavors: Original and Chick-fil-A Sauce.
